definition: a notch or open space between two merlons in a crenelated battlement, to supply with battlements
details:
noun
- a notch or open space between two merlons in a crenelated battlement
= synonyms: crenelle
- one of a series of rounded projections (or the notches between them) formed by curves along an edge (as the edge of a leaf or piece of cloth or the margin of a shell or a shriveled red blood cell observed in a hypertonic solution etc.)
= synonyms: scallop
verb
- to supply with battlements
= synonyms: crenelate, crenellate
